name: Eternal Referee
description: A figure in pristine white, existing simultaneously at every point of the endless court. Their whistle echoes through eternity.

dialogue.greeting: Isaac, welcome to the Court of Eternal Triumph! Where every serve is perfect and every rally is legendary!

about_court.initial: Here, the game never truly ends - it just keeps getting better!
about_court.rules: The rules are simple: play with joy, celebrate every point, and remember - everyone's a winner!
about_court.philosophy: In eternal pickleball, it's not about the score - it's about the infinite possibilities of each rally.

about_items.pickleball_paddle: This paddle has never known defeat - because here, every shot is a victory!
about_items.victory_medal: A medal that multiplies itself - because in eternal pickleball, everyone deserves recognition!

about_game.wisdom: The secret to eternal pickleball? Play each point like it's both your first and your millionth!
